attributes.description: This dashboard shows Alerts logs collected by the Palo Alto Cortex XDR integration.

params.markdown:
**Navigation**

**Palo Alto Cortex XDR**

- **Alerts**
- [Incidents](#/dashboard/panw_cortex_xdr-10c6821e-1f7c-4ea6-acf8-e667ab0f03ce)
- [Events](#/dashboard/panw_cortex_xdr-acba7c6a-e721-46ea-9263-1d0d8cc61922)

**Overview**

This dashboard showcases critical insights derived from alert data, offering a streamlined view of system activity. It includes a Control Panel for filtering by Operating System and Host Name, and features key visualizations such as Top 10 Hosts with Highest Alerts, Total Alerts, Whitelisted Alerts, Alerts by Severity over Time, Alerts by OS Name, Alerts by Category, and essential details of alert events for deeper visibility.

[**Integrations Page**](/app/integrations/detail/panw_cortex_xdr-2.2.0/overview)
